column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tenzin says : " After your coronation , the United Forces will escort you to Ba Sing Se . "
#Text=Wu says : " Right .
#Text=" Wu says : " Uh ... define " pretty much " .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Well , the roving bandits have mostly been dispersed .
#Text=" Wu says : " Mostly ?
#Text=" Lin says : " Do n't worry kid .
#Text=The chances of you being assassinated are almost zero .
#Text=" Wu says : " Almost ?
#Text=" Shopkeeper says : " Get out of here !
#Text=We do n't have anything left .
#Text=" Bandit # 1 says : " Now you do n't have anything left .
#Text=" Kai says : " It 's safe to come out , everyone !
#Text=The airbenders are here .
#Text=" Governor says : " You finally made it !
#Text=So where are the rest of you ?
#Text=" Opal says : " Actually , it 's just the two of us , but we 're going to do everything we can to help .
#Text=I 'm Opal , and this is Kai .
#Text=" Kai says : " It 's nice to meet you .
#Text=" Governor says : " What ?
#Text=I called Master Tenzin because my state has been under siege by bandits for months .
#Text=They blocked all the roads , cut off our supply lines , and all he sent is you two kids ?
#Text=" Kai says : " Hey , us two kids just took care of those three guys for you .
#Text=" Governor says : " There are hundreds more where they came from .
#Text=My citizens are going hungry .
#Text=Our entire state is on the brink of collapse .
#Text=" Opal says : " Unfortunately , the Air Nation is spread thin right now .
#Text=We 're all you have .
#Text=" Bolin says : " We just got some good news .
#Text=Two more Earth Kingdom states have agreed to join us .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Excellent !
#Text=Thank you , Bolin .
#Text=We 're ninety percent there , Kuvira .
#Text=" Varrick says : " That 's great !
#Text=Zhu Li , dish out some of that special celebration tea !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " None for me .
#Text=I wo n't celebrate until the Earth Kingdom is one hundred percent reunited .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Why have we stopped ?
#Text=" Driver says : " Apologies .
#Text=There are rocks on the tracks .
#Text=It 's most likely bandits .
#Text=We 're sending troops to handle the situation .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Call them off .
#Text=I will take care of the bandits myself .
#Text="
